meanings.definition: A small, leaf-like appendage at the base of a leafstalk.
meanings.sent1: The stipels on the plant help support the leaves.
meanings.sent2: She carefully observed the stipels on the stem of the flower.
meanings.sent3: The tiny stipels seemed to wave hello as the wind rustled the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The stipels acted like tiny hands, gently holding the leaf in place.
meanings.sent5: The green stipels looked like miniature fans, fanning the leaf gently.

meanings.definition: A pair of small, leaf-like appendages at the base of a leafstalk.
meanings.sent1: The stipels on the stem were so small yet important for the plant.
meanings.sent2: The botanist pointed out the stipels at the base of the leafstalk.
meanings.sent3: The stipels on the plant looked like tiny wings ready to take flight.
meanings.sent4: The stipels held the leafstalk like a pair of delicate hands.
meanings.sent5: The stipels resembled two tiny leaves hugging the stem tightly.

meanings.definition: A small, leaf-like structure at the base of a leafstalk.
meanings.sent1: The stipels added a unique touch to the plant's appearance.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the intricate design of the stipels on the leafstalk.
meanings.sent3: The stipels on the stem played hide and seek with the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The stipels were like nature's delicate ornaments on the plant.
meanings.sent5: The stipels shimmered in the morning dew, enhancing the leafstalk's beauty.
